jd: From: Sanjay, Vyze Inc sanjay@vyzeinc.com Reply to: sanjay@vyzeinc.com Job Title- Project coordinatorLocation: Remote (anywhere in the USA) Duration- 12monthsVisa- USC, GCThis one requires between 3 and 4 years of xpJOB DESCRIPTION-Your Impact:- Oversee approximately 40 projects simultaneously, driving results with effective coordination.- Collaborate with stakeholders to set project kickoff calls and timelines.- Develop and maintain clear project schedules, ensuring all team members understand their responsibilities.- Track and report team hours and expenses weekly, keeping everything on track.Your Experience:- Strong project management background with excellent communication skills.- Highly organized, detail-oriented, and flexible in adapting to changing priorities.- Proficiency in project management tools and spreadsheets.
